text:
You most likely didn't install nilearn correctly. How did you install
nilearn?

text:
How about you try uninstalling (pip uninstall nilearn) and reinstalling
it?

text:
I just had an idea: do you have a file or a directory named nilearn.py or
nilearn in your current directory? If so, it is overriding the global
nilearn.

text:

then it worked several times and now I always have the same problem. 
I tried to update nilearn with the latest version, but I always have the same error...
